refnamediv.refpurpose: Display or concatenate contents of files

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This command functions much like the typical Unix "cat" command, in that it displays the contents of a file, or concatenates them given two or more files. However, this command requires the user to specify a commit - a checksum or refspec corresponding to a given build. If you use a refspec, OSTree will refer to the most recent commit, unless you specify a parent build using the carat (^) at the end of the refspec. It will then operate the command in that given commit.

refentry.refsect1:
Example
$ ostree cat my-branch helloworld.txt Hello, world!
